content: {"name": "Quakertown Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "You will have a few required pieces of paperwork to fill out which is a federal/state requirement. Each time you come to the pantry, always bring a photo ID and/or proof of residency in the Quakertown Community School District (such as a utility bill). If you live in another area, we will direct you to the nearest pantry in your area and provide you a pre-packed bag until you can get there. You are permitted to visit the Quakertown Food Pantry once per week. We will fill an order of food for you and your family members that live with you as indicated for three days worth of food and any additional support we can provide.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.quakertownfoodpantry.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "101B North 3rd Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Quakertown", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "18951", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.443017, "longitude": -75.336891}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 536-0240", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
